item_prototype.description: Quiesced, Rollfwd and Standby means unavailable for SQL usage. For Standby status it's not a problem because data are reachable from primary database.

trigger_prototype.name: DB2 Instance {$DB2_INSTANCE_NAME} - database {$DB2_DATABASE_NAME} - % of sorts in overflow > {$DB2_MAX_SORT_OVERFLOW}
